docs.snippet: In recent years, Mexican drug traffickers have inundated the St. Louis area with a new, potent form of heroin, drastically reducing prices to lure suburban users....
docs.lead_paragraph: In recent years, Mexican drug traffickers have inundated the St. Louis area with a new, potent form of heroin, drastically reducing prices to lure suburban users.
docs.abstract: Rising gang violence and shootings in St Louis are partially attributed to heroin epidemic affecting area; influx of new low-cost version of heroin introduced to market by Mexican drug cartels in recent years have attracted suburban customers and encouraged turf wars among gangs with deadly consequences.

headline.main: Crime Spike in St. Louis Traced to Cheap Heroin and Mexican Cartels
headline.print_headline: Violence in St. Louis Traced to Cheap Mexican Heroin

docs.snippet: Law enforcement sought 165 repeat offenders in March, the third major sweep by the state in the past three months....
docs.lead_paragraph: Law enforcement sought 165 repeat offenders in March, the third major sweep by the state in the past three months.
docs.abstract: New York's Corrections and Community Supervision Department oversaw large-scale multi-agency sweep intended to round up some of city's 2,800 parole violators in March, apprehending 69 of 165 they had sought; Manhattan sweep mirrors previous efforts in New York State and across country.

headline.main: New York State Steps Up Arrests of Parole Violators
headline.print_headline: State Agency  Cracks Down  on Violators  of Parole

byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and MICHAEL WINERIP

docs.snippet: When Ibrahim El Bakraoui blew himself up in the Brussels Airport check-in area, killing and maiming scores of travelers, it was at least the third time he had passed unimpeded through an airport terminal in recent months....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Ibrahim El Bakraoui blew himself up in the Brussels Airport check-in area, killing and maiming scores of travelers, it was at least the third time he had passed unimpeded through an airport terminal in recent months.

headline.main: Foreign Fighters Are Evading Europe's Security Net
headline.print_headline: Foreign Fighters Are Evading Europe's Security Net
